name: places/ChIJZ5ZxgOtYwokRkkFK7B6LT-g
formattedAddress: 710 Park Ave #1a, New York, NY 10021, USA
adrFormatAddress: 710 Park Ave #1a, New York, NY 10021, USA

originalText.text:
I’ve had a hair transplant with another doctor before coming to see Dr. Robin Unger. The results of my first procedure were unsatisfactory with no follow up!
When I did the procedure with Dr. Robin Unger I noticed the difference was remarkable. The procedure was smooth and painless. The staff, Cheryl, John, Joy, and Allison took all the care necessary to make me feel comfortable, and the follow up was 100% on point. They are extremely friendly and most importantly very qualified! If you are considering such a procedure, don’t waste your time looking somewhere else! The doctor to go to is Robin Unger and her team!
I recommend her wholeheartedly!

originalText.text: Great experience and results! Dr. Robin Unger is highly skilled and knowledgeable and patiently answered all my questions. The nurses and technicians—Cheryl, Crosby, John and Paule—are terrific and very friendly and positive. Joy is warm and helpful.

text.text: Great experience and results! Dr. Robin Unger is highly skilled and knowledgeable and patiently answered all my questions. The nurses and technicians—Cheryl, Crosby, John and Paule—are terrific and very friendly and positive. Joy is warm and helpful.

originalText.text: Amazing FUE experience with Dr Unger and her dedicated team. My primary nurse Cheryl was a joy to work with; helpful from the months leading up - making sure I had all my questions answered and tests done - to the day of the procedure where she was with me the whole time- to all the follow ups. Dr Unger had actually tried to discourage me from a surgery initially to see if I could instead get the results I wanted with medication alone. That patient first attitude is what you want in your surgeon. I live out of state and they were very accommodating with virtual consultations and detailed instructions. And I was referred to her by the CEO of a hair restoration drug company so a highly qualified referral. Its expensive for a reason; with something like your hair you don’t want to take shortcuts. I was shocked how many follicles they were able to successfully transplant, and they added coverage for areas they anticipate i will experience future loss. Go here and thank me later. And thanks to Dr Unger cheryl and the whole team for a delightful experience.

originalText.text:
Dr Unger is the kind of doctor you hope for. She is professional, knowledgeable, personable and kind. And, I have had amazing results from PRP. Her technique sets her apart. I cannot recommend her more highly.
In addition, all of her staff is professional, efficient, attentive and kind.

text.text:
Dr Unger is the kind of doctor you hope for. She is professional, knowledgeable, personable and kind. And, I have had amazing results from PRP. Her technique sets her apart. I cannot recommend her more highly.
In addition, all of her staff is professional, efficient, attentive and kind.

originalText.text:
Dr Unger and her staff are incredible throughout the entire process from the moment you walk into their office. As a patient of multiple procedures here over several years, the level of care, knowledge, hospitality, and attentiveness have always been above and beyond. Not only do they deliver on excellent results, but they make you feel comfortable, welcome, and provide a genuine friendliness that is hard to find. Cheryl and the team of technicians always greet you with a smile and are always available to answer any questions with detail and knowledge. Mary Joy and Sandra are always warm and welcoming when you enter, and help make what can be an intimating experience much more relaxed and comfortable from the start.
Dr Unger has done amazing work and the results and genuine care she delivers cannot be beat. She's created a team of experienced, knowledgeable, and caring individuals who always go the extra mile to make sure you're well taken care of, comfortable, and feel like part of their family. I would highly recommend Dr Unger as their professionalism and expertise prove that they are one of, if not the best, at what they do.

Thank you Dr. Unger and to the entire team!
